Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features and benefits that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its high-quality standards and unique capabilities, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $15000. This is a special opportunity to secure this product at a rate that reflects its true value and quality. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
